value:
$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|It's about time we get started.
Planning a strategy is nice, but war
is a vigorous business.$k$pExpect me to wrap things up pretty
quickly.$k$p$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Normal,Face|Easy, friend. There's more to battle
than strength—knowing when and
where to focus that strength counts.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Normal,Face|Don't think I'll make it easy for you. I
intend to give it my all!$k$p
